Name: Agile
Desc: Increases 15%-30% movement speed. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Agile
Desc: Increases 20%-35% movement speed. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Agile
Desc: Increases 25%-40% movement speed. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Immovable
Desc: Immune to hit and control effects.

Name: Recovery
Desc: Recovers HP per second by 0.05% in most

Name: Recovery
Desc: Recovers HP per second by 0.1% in most

Name: Recovery
Desc: Recovers up to 0.15% HP per second.

Name: Shield
Desc: Receives a shield equal to 15% of current HP for 3s every 8s.

Name: Shield
Desc: Receives a shield equal to 25% of current HP for 3s every 8s.

Name: Shield
Desc: Receives a shield equal to 35% of current HP for 3s every 8s.

Name: Berserk
Desc: Increases Attack Frequency by 33% and has a 20% chance to deal 33% extra Physical DMG when damaging a target.

Name: Berserk
Desc: Increases Attack Frequency by 66% and has a 30% chance to deal 33% extra Physical DMG when damaging a target.

Name: Berserk
Desc: Increases Attack Frequency by 100% and has a 40% chance to deal 33% extra Physical DMG when damaging a target.

Name: Bomb
Desc: A bomb left after death that deals 35% Physical DMG.

Name: Bomb
Desc: A bomb left after death that deals 45% Physical Damage

Name: Bomb
Desc: A bomb left after death that deals 60% Physical DMG.

Name: Rigid Body
Desc: Only takes 1 damage from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 6 times, and resumes 8s later.

Name: Rigid Body
Desc: Only takes 1 damage from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 9 times, and resumes 8s later.

Name: Rigid Body
Desc: Only takes 1 damage from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 12 times, and resumes 8s later.

Name: Barrier
Desc: Receives a permanent shield equal to 15% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. After taking a certain amount of DMG, the shield will be removed and reactivated in 15s.

Name: Barrier
Desc: Receives a permanent shield equal to 25% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. After taking a certain amount of DMG, the shield will be removed and reactivated in 15s.

Name: Barrier
Desc: Receives a permanent shield equal to 35% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. After taking a certain amount of DMG, the shield will be removed and reactivated in 15s.

Name: Radiation
Desc: Continuously deals 6% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Radiation
Desc: Continuously deals 8% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Radiation
Desc: Continuously deals 10% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Radiation
Desc: Continuously deals 1.25% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Closed Loop
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 30% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Closed Loop
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 45% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Closed Loop
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 60% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Blessing
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 10%

Name: Blessing
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 20%

Name: Blessing
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 30%.

Name: Lone Wolf
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times. The fewer allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Lone Wolf
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 4.5%. Stacks up to 10 times. The fewer allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Lone Wolf
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Stacks up to 10 times. The fewer allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Commander
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times. The more allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Commander
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 4.5%. Stacks up to 10 times. The more allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Commander
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Stacks up to 10 times. The more allies nearby, the more stacks will be granted.

Name: Penetration
Desc: Dealing DMG will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Penetration
Desc: Dealing DMG will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 4%. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Penetration
Desc: Dealing DMG will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 5%. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Lightning Shield
Desc: When attacked, has a 15%-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 20% Lightning DMG. 3s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Lightning Shield
Desc: When attacked, has a 15%-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 25% Lightning DMG. 2.5s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Lightning Shield
Desc: When attacked, has a 15%-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 30% Lightning DMG. 2s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Wave
Desc: Creates a shockwave upon getting up, repelling nearby enemies.

Name: Lightning Mine
Desc: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 15% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Lightning Mine
Desc: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 20% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Lightning Mine
Desc: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 25% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Invisibility
Desc: When visible, you will gain invisibility after 5s. If you are hit, you must wait 3s to reactivate it.

Name: Invisibility
Desc: When visible, you will gain invisibility after 3s. If you are hit, you must wait 3s to reactivate it.

Name: Invisibility
Desc: When visible, you will gain invisibility after 1s. If you are hit, you must wait 3s to reactivate it.

Name: Flash
Desc: Teleports near the target when they are far away. 8-10s cooldown. The farther the teleport distance, the shorter the cooldown will become.

Name: Flash
Desc: Teleports near the target when they are far away. 7-9s cooldown. The farther the teleport distance, the shorter the cooldown will become.

Name: Flash
Desc: Teleports near the target when they are far away. 6-8s cooldown. The farther the teleport distance, the shorter the cooldown will become.

Name: Transfer
Desc: Teleport away when close to the target. 8s cooldown. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Transfer
Desc: Teleport away when close to the target. 7s cooldown. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Transfer
Desc: Teleport away when close to the target. 6s cooldown. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Division
Desc: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 30% of their ATK and DEF at dying

Name: Division
Desc: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 60% ATK and DEF upon dying.

Name: Division
Desc: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 100% ATK and DEF upon dying.

Name: Black Hole
Desc: Periodically leaves a black hole with weak gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Black Hole
Desc: Periodically leaves a black hole with moderate gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Black Hole
Desc: Periodically leaves a black hole with strong gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Laser
Desc: Periodically unleashes lasers in the eight cardinal directions, dealing 3% continuous Physical DMG.

Name: Laser
Desc: Periodically unleashes lasers in the eight cardinal directions, dealing 4% continuous Physical Damage.

Name: Laser
Desc: Periodically unleashes lasers in the eight cardinal directions, dealing 5% continuous Physical Damage.

Name: Flame
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 10% Fire DMG and have a 10% chance to inflict Burn, dealing 10% Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Flame
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 15% Fire DMG and have a 15% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 15% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Flame
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 20% Fire DMG and have a 20% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 20% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Freeze
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 10% Ice DMG, slow down the Target's Movement Speed by 15%, and have a 10% chance to Freeze for 0.3s.

Name: Freeze
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 15% Ice DMG, slow down the Target's Movement Speed by 20%, and have a 15% chance to Freeze for 0.5s.

Name: Freeze
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 20% Ice DMG, slow down the Target's Movement Speed by 25%, and have a 20% chance to Freeze for 0.7s.

Name: Shadow
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 10% Dark DMG with a 10% chance to stun the target for 0.5s and deal 10% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Shadow
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 15% Dark DMG with a 15% chance to stun the target for 0.7s and deal 15% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Shadow
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 20% Dark DMG with a 20% chance to stun the target for 0.9s and deal 20% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Thunderous
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 10% Lightning DMG and have a 10% chance to channel lightning, striking the target area once every 1.5s for 1.5s.

Name: Thunderous
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 15% Lightning DMG and have a 15% chance to channel lightning, striking the target area once every 1.5s for 3s.

Name: Thunderous
Desc: Attacks deal an additional 20% Lightening DMG and have a 20% of chance for Channeling, and unleash lightning once to target every 1.5s, for 4.5s

Name: Cold Trail
Desc: Unleash an Ice Block to keep tracing the target, dealing 5% Ice DMG when the Ice Block contacts the target. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Cold Trail
Desc: Unleash an Ice Block to keep tracing the target, dealing 10% Ice DMG when the Ice Block contacts the target. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Cold Trail
Desc: Unleash an Ice Block to keep tracing the target, dealing 15% Ice DMG when the Ice Block contacts the target. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Deterioration
Desc: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 30% for 3s.

Name: Deterioration
Desc: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 45% for 4s.

Name: Deterioration
Desc: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 60% for 5s.

Name: Null Heal
Desc: Periodically make the target unable to receive any healing effects for 3s.

Name: Null Heal
Desc: Periodically make the target unable to receive any healing effects for 4s.

Name: Null Heal
Desc: Periodically make the target unable to receive any healing effects for 5s.

Name: Imprison
Desc: Creates a barrier at the target location that blocks the targets from entering or leaving for 3s. 15s cooldown.

Name: Imprison
Desc: Creates a barrier at the target location that blocks the targets from entering or leaving for 4s. 16s cooldown.

Name: Imprison
Desc: Creates a barrier at the target location that blocks the targets from entering or leaving for 5s. 17s cooldown.

Name: Invasion
Desc: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other Damage Affix effects for 3s.

Name: Invasion
Desc: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other Damage Affix effects for 4s.

Name: Invasion
Desc: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other Damage Affix effects for 5s.

Name: Backfire
Desc: Generate an energy shield that deals 15% Physical DMG to the attackers. Lasts 3s. 16s cooldown.

Name: Backfire
Desc: Generates an energy shield for 4s that deals 25% Physical DMG to targets. 17s cooldown.

Name: Backfire
Desc: Generates an energy shield for 5s that deals 35% Physical DMG to targets. 18s cooldown.

Name: Diffusion
Desc: Enemy attacks will remove 1 Signal Orb. When the enemy dies, it returns all Signal Orbs.

Name: Recuperation
Desc: Heals 1 nearby ally's HP equal to your ATK every 10s.

Name: Last Destruction
Desc: When the enemy dies, DMG reduction of all allies within 20m of it will decrease by 20%. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Last Assault
Desc: When the enemy dies, all allies within 20m of it will receive 25% more DMG. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Last Healing
Desc: When the enemy dies, all allies within 20m of it restore 20% HP.

Name: Enduring Shield
Desc: Grants you and nearby allies a shield equal to 10% of your current HP every 10s. Shields granted this way cannot be stacked.

Name: Sacrifice
Desc: Randomly selects 1 ally as a protected target. When the protected target dies, sacrifice yourself to revive the target to full HP.

Name: Self-Destruction Bug
Desc: Periodically summons 1 Self-Destruction Bug to attack the enemy.

Name: Devour
Desc: Kills 1 nearby ally every 30s to restore 20% HP.

Name: Soul Devourer
Desc: Increases ATK by 20% for each dead ally.
